gameobjects

Class AnimatedGameobject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobjects.GameObject
      • gameobjects.AnimatedGameobject

  • public class AnimatedGameobject
extends GameObject
    Convenience Class subclassing GameObject, pre-creationg a subclass of Artist that draws a bitmap animation described by the Animation class. The controller is left undefined, the collider as well. A cll to gneerateCalliders will put in place a correct rectangular collider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedGameobject

        public AnimatedGameobject(java.lang.String id,
                          Playground pg,
                          double x,
                          double y,
                          double vx,
                          double vy,
                          double scale,
                          Animation anim,
                          double t0,
                          java.lang.String abspielmodus)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - object name
        pg - Playground instance decribing level
        x - posx
        y - posy
        vx - speedx
        vy - speedy
        scale - scale the animation by this factor
        anim - Animation instance into which avalid animation has been loaded.
        t0 - game time at construction of the object. Needed to control replay.
        abspielmodus - forward|backwards|loop are options here
